alert.note: Alert for Boone; Callaway; Cole; Moniteau (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 9:12PM CDT until August 04 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cole County in central Missouri... Southern Boone County in central Missouri... Southwestern Callaway County in central Missouri... Northeastern Moniteau County in central Missouri... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 911 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jamestown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jefferson City, California, Ashland, Holts Summit, Columbia Regional Airport, Wardsville, St. Martins, New Bloomfield, Jamestown, Lake Mykee Town, Centertown, Easley, McGirk, Lake Mykee, Marion, Lohman, Hartsburg, Lupus, Elston, and Sandy Hook. This also includes Jefferson Landing Historic Site. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
